scripts.bootstrap-nix: yarn && spago install && yarn2nix > yarn.nix && spago2nix generate
scripts.full-clean: rm -rf node_modules output .spago dist/* *.lock spago-packages.nix yarn.nix .spago2nix .cache spago.dhall packages.dhall
scripts.install-new-deps: spago install && yarn2nix > yarn.nix && spago2nix generate
scripts.watch: yarn watch:css && spago bundle-app --watch --main Main --to dist/app.js
scripts.bundle: spago bundle-app --main Main --to dist/app.js && parcel build assets/*.html
